website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable for both wearer and baby, this versatile carrier is the best on the market.
pros: Four secure position choices for baby
cons: Infant insert is a separate purchase

customer_reviews.title: FAKE ERGO
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an ergobaby Cool Air Mesh and it was fulfilled by amazon. Honestly, it worked out great, but I didn't know that it was actually sold by a 3rd party (Slings and Things). Recently the clasp broke, and I contacted ergobaby for support, and they regretfully informed me that it was FAKE!! I was extremely surprised and disappointed and knowing this, I also would NOT BUY important infant items from amazon going forward. BUYERS BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hua

customer_reviews.title: Simply not as comfortable as the cotton version!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the cool air mesh and the cotton Ergo 360. Living in Southern California, I really wanted to love the cool air mesh version; however, it is simply nowhere near as comfortable as the original, soft cotton - for Mama or for baby. After trying both, I decided to keep the (warmer) cotton version, because I'd rather us both be a little warm but way more comfortable, than feel uncomfortable (hard and scratchy) with more airflow.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: child loves it
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace our older ergo baby carrier, and our little girls favorite position to be in this is the new forward facing position. if you are thinking about upgrading, i would recommend it as now she can see everything going on in front of her and just looks in awe of her new perspective. it is also very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: andrew havens

customer_reviews.title: Was listed as Open Box, got a very used product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carrier as an Open Box item. Arrived with animal hair and fleas, along with an "inspected by Amazon" tag. The carrier itself was quite bulky and didn't fit right. I am average height and slender. I went with the Onya carrier since the straps are wider, less bulky, and can be crossed in the back. I cannot reach the back clasp, so I need to be able to cross the straps or they will fall off. This carrier will probably work if you are tall and have wide shoulders. But don't order the Open Box. It also smelled really bad when it was opened. The Onya didn't have a bad/strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I bought this Ergobaby carrier (the gray one in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Ergobaby carrier (the gray one in the pictures) almost two years ago and used for a year. It did the job, greatly eased the days caring for my baby. But recently my friend bought another Ergo mesh (the blue one in the pictures). As you can see there are many differences in details between the two Ergos, especially the waist belt of mine is narrower and longer. Can anyone tell me if I purchased a fake ergo?
customer_reviews.author: Feiting Cheng

customer_reviews.title: It does not looke like original ergobaby
customer_reviews.text: It’s not real ergobaby i think, it does not have all the tags it supposed to have on ergobaby original one. It does not look like original ergobaby. It’s used thus it says new with damaged packacging! It was washed!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: I love their products!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! 10yrs. ago I had the original carrier. Super comfy, but I gave it away as I did not think I would have any more children. This 360 mesh one is not scratchy to me (as some reviews have described), and I hope it’ll feel comfy for baby after I deliver as well.. Extremely comfortable and easy to use though, and I tested it out with my daughter’s doll 😂 (with the added infant insert that I bought separately..)
customer_reviews.author: Strutz

customer_reviews.title: Mesh lining gives a rash.
customer_reviews.text: Ok pros: Well made Sturdy Light weight Comfortable positions Cons: The mesh venting system is wrapped around the entire inside so my babies arms and legs get a rash every time we wear it. It also makes it uncomfortable on my shoulders if the mesh was not so scratchy I would give this five stars very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous one

customer_reviews.title: Ergobaby is great, but the mesh wasn't a great fit for us.
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review in hopes that other mamas that have hefty babies will benefit. I think if your baby is on the slimmer side, the mesh won't irritate the skin, but for our little one (almost 20lbs), the mesh liner really started chafing her thighs after just one day. We ended up going for the normal Ergobaby Carrier (360) because I think these are the best made and highest quality carriers out there, but definitely just make sure the mesh is a good fit for your little one. I loved the idea for breathability, it just didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: I will say that this is the best carrier I have come across. I also love that you can use it from a newborn on up. My issue with this is that, unless I didn't read into it enough, it is very difficult, if not impossible, to put this on with a baby without the assistance of another person. This causes problems when you would like to do things at home or out and about and don't have anyone there to assist you with it. Otherwise, I love, love this carrier. If it weren't for this issue, I would use it a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: jowell d mcfarland

customer_reviews.title: Differences and Dislikes vs. Adapt/Original
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this carrier because my LO runs hot. However, the quality is not as good as the Adapt or Original carrier. With a polyester mesh, the rest of the carrier is also polyester. Because of this, the privacy hood doesn’t allow for any ventilation. I often found my LO’s head a sweaty mess. I’m not sure why Ergobaby made the entire carrier polyester, kind of defeats the purpose of breathability.
customer_reviews.author: xtw1nkles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable baby wearing
customer_reviews.text: I researched many carriers and finally decided on this one. I was worried wearing baby all day would hurt my back. We have used the ergo 360 for several all day outings and it is very supportive and doesn’t hurt my back. Baby loves to look around and it’s easy to transition from forward to inward facing. I can’t say enough good things about it. We keep it in the trunk of our car and use it all the time. It was pricy compared to other carriers, but so worth the investment. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Krista & Tommy Huff

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the $
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice carrier. My daughter has hip dysplasia so I wanted to make sure to buy a carrier that supported her hips. This one is great and her doctor approved of it. The shoulder straps are a little wide for me so they sit far out on my shoulders, but it’s still comfortable. My daughter is short (20th percentile for height) so the first few months with her facing outwards I had to put a small towel under her butt so her face would not be squished. Now she 9 months and this fits her great. Lots of back support and cushion. It’s pricey, but the best one I have found.
customer_reviews.author: efenton

customer_reviews.title: The best baby carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these ergo 360 for three years now. Such a good investment. Used it on so many trips hiking and traipsing around Europe. On its second kid now. I bought the infant insert this second time around and it held my newborn very nicely inside the ergo. My husband enjoys baby wearing in it too. Still feels like brand new after three years. A very good buy! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Dosa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and provides a lot of support
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this when my baby was around 9 months and she was tolerant of it, but she didn’t love it. Now that she is closer to a year, I put her in when she doesn’t want me to sit with her, and she loves looking outward as we do errands around the house. The carrier is easy to put on while holding your baby and the lumbar strap is very supportive and doesn’t hurt my back.
customer_reviews.author: Ames Eggerbee

customer_reviews.title: Most favorite baby carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I had the Ergo Original with my first two kids, and loved it! So I was so happy to get the 360 for my third! He loves being able to face out, the love the support it gives my back. I can carry my big guy around for hours. I’m currently 15 weeks pregnant with my fourth and I just carried my son, who weighs 22lbs, around for hours at the zoo and I had no pain or fatigue! I also love how easy it is to breastfeed my little ones while they are in it. The buckles and straps are all easy to use and in great locations. I highly recommend the Ergo 360!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after receiving a couple of older Ergobaby carriers, the older ones that don't allow front-facing. Our baby didn't like being face in, but loves being carried face out where he can see everything going on around him. We use this a lot when we're doing things around the house, shopping in places where a stroller isn't handy, or running around at Disney.
customer_reviews.author: MiCTLaN

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this after reading all the reviews about it however sadly I had To return it It was completely uncomfortable for both me and my husband within minutes and we don’t suffer from backaches, baby didn’t seem to like it either Didn’t feel like it was supportive at all
customer_reviews.author: yaniv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support, adjustable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This baby carrier is awesome! I love how I can use multiple positions for my baby. I got the infant insert when he was little and now that he’s bigger I took it out and wear him forward facing, he loves it. Being able to utilize this when you have multiple kids is nice, I also use for hikes, walks, shopping etc. it’s very comfortable, adjustable and easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Scheffel

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby and caregiver
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite baby buys. I also bought a Solly wrap and didn’t need to this is so much easier, faster, and doesn’t jam into my rib cage like the wrap. My son is 96 percentile and I was starting to get back aches from carrying him around. This saved me. I use it everyday in the house and outside. I highly recommend it. You won’t need any other carrier.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Smell awful!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know the reason where the item come from, but it smells like baby feces. We let it "cool down" on a hanger for 2 days, the strong smell still remains. I cannot hold any longer so have to return it for good. I simply cannot let my kid anywhere close to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. X

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this carrier. The fabric is great quality and my son was comfortable along with myself. Returning this however, because I can’t get this on alone - need someone to help me either get him in or to clip the back clip. Disappointed that I can’t get it on by myself.
customer_reviews.author: LindseyT

customer_reviews.title: The cool air really makes a difference and we don't end ...
customer_reviews.text: Ergobaby is the only carrier my LO will actually sleep in. I've tried the original and being in Texas the carrier became way too unbearable with the heat. The cool air really makes a difference and we don't end up being soaked in sweat after using it. Definitely recommend for hot weather!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby’s that want to face out!
customer_reviews.text: We tried 5 different carriers before we found this one. Our 6 month old LOVES to face out, she will cry if you face her in but is the happiest baby facing out. We started using this when she was 3 months old. She has excellent head control so our pediatrician said it was ok and loved this carrier. It supports her legs without rubbing anywhere. We use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: ATX Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m still unsure about the front facing position as my baby looks uncomfortable to me, but I love this. I wanted it since I was pregnant and I couldn’t be happier. I bought accessories to go with it and I think it’s one the nicest things I’ve ever bought for me and baby. I truly am happy with the fabric, color, construction and most importantly the fact that my baby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice front carrier, works decent on back
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice front carrier, much nicer than other ones I've used, because the adjustments feel solid and the padding is excellent. My wife likes using it as a back carrier as well, but the side carry function I think is a little awkward. We've used this starting when he was about 12 pounds, and he is 25 pounds now and it still is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rau

customer_reviews.title: Cool Mesh model is too rough on baby - Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sooo disappointed with this carrier. The fabric is extremely rough for the baby and for me (and I don't have sensitive skin). My baby has scratches wherever she gets in contact with the mesh. It's also very rigid and bulky which makes it even more uncomfortable and looks very weird when wearing it. Unfortunately I bought it before she was born and now I'm stuck with it. I emailed Ergobaby with no response. Very disappointed. I DON'T recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: trini

customer_reviews.title: Great Support and the baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried this in the forward facing to date as our big 4 month old dislikes the daddy facing position. The kid loves being in this and seeing what is going on. It has become our go to putting the baby to sleep when he is being difficult. Maybe just our son, but it works and this is a very sturdy product. expect to use it for at least a year!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Roesti

customer_reviews.title: Better fit for Men
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is difficult to put on and wear if you have a chest. My husband has not had any issues wearing it but has told me it is a bit uncomfortable for him and the baby. I wish I had my money back for this purchase as it has gone completely to waste due to being difficult and uncomfortable especially while I was breast feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: The best and easiest to use ergonomic carrier
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and breathable. I like that there are many different options of ways to wear baby and it’s Easy to switch positions. I know there are a lot of other knockoff ergonomic carriers out there for less but I still feel like these are worth the price and the quality holds up over repeated and consistent use, it’s worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this is so highly recommended. It feels like it’s going to fall off and is such a struggle to get into place and adjust. I don’t trust it enough to get my baby on my back without a support person. Hip position is uncomfortable for my baby. These are the two positions I bought this for and we can only do front carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for so many reasons
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I hate leaving 5 star reviews because I always want to give feed back that’s constructive but I have no complaints. My son does not like containers of many sorts and he loves loves loves this carrier. It’s comfortable to wear and I mean comfortable. Plus my husband uses it too. He wears it to soothe our son when I have to leave for an hour or two. Very sturdy material and I love my mint color. I even bought the waterproof protectors so my son won’t drool onto the actual material and this I won’t have to wash it so often. I have told all my friends about this carrier and I’d definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyne R Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: My LO is on the smaller side so the other fabric type carriers don't work the best for him. I bought the insert with this carrier and he fits almost perfectly. He is around 6 lbs and the carrier does say for 7lbs and heavier; however because he is a long/tall baby he does fit fairly well. I prefer it better over the fabric type carriers!
customer_reviews.author: LJoo83

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this carrier! I wish I ordered it 3 kids ago ;-) seriously love this thing! My son loves to face out. This is so comfy for both of us! Easy to put in all by myself and he loves it ! I researched for about a week and I kept coming back to this carrier. I’m so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I thought this was the best ever. It’s okay. It does the job, but my shoulders are killing me after about an hour or so (and my baby is only 16 lbs). I think I’d go with one that crosses in the back if I had the chance to do it over.
customer_reviews.author: Meowtha

customer_reviews.title: My baby feels comfortable in it
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommend me to buy ergo carrier for the good comfort for the baby and I'm so agree with her! So easy to use, cool mesh is helping to breathe to skin, very useful because it's getting hotter outside. It's very light so no extra weight on you. It has extra support on the back, cant be more than happy with that. I put 4 stars only because I didn't have instructions inside the box
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier out there for warm weather
customer_reviews.text: We tried all of the major brands and several Ergobaby carriers and this was the best for us. The fabric is comfy and breathable for baby and the baby can move from rear facing to forward facing and it can be worn on the back. Other carriers were not as breathable or the fabric mesh fabric was not as soft. The only issue with the carrier is there is no pocket or else I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Van E

customer_reviews.title: Need one more belt to balance the weight from shoulders and neck.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not so happy because the seller reduces the price after i bought it. Anyway, great product, it gets my baby to sleep after we figured out how to use it correctly. But it really need to add one more belt at back. All baby's weight put on my shoulders and neck. And I have to stand straight ,otherwise I will feel like the shoulder belts loose, and my neck take all baby's weight. My baby is 16lbs now. I think I will need buy another one later for toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Little boxes

customer_reviews.title: Baby is uncomfortable in it
customer_reviews.text: Well made- but makes my babies legs over extend. She is 15.5 lbs /18 weeks and she HATES this carrier. She’s super uncomfortable- she sits too low and her legs are spread too far.... I hope as she gets bigger it is more comfortable bc it was expensive. She loves her Moby style wrap/ I can make it contour perfectly to her Body and she is cozy and content
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWoman

customer_reviews.title: Not for dads
customer_reviews.text: I’m a dad. I’ve tried a multitude of carriers. This one was the worst so far. It’s essentially a two person job to put on and absolutely a two person if you go back carry. Not user friendly or intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Colson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am IN LOVE with this carrier! I had the Ergo Original, which is also incredibly comfy, but my son loves facing forward. I opted for the mesh because summer is fast approaching and I am so glad I did. I love how versatile it is, and how easy to use! Best of all, carrying around my 15 lb baby and my back doesn't kill me, I can hardly feel his weight with how it distributes it!
customer_reviews.author: Rodeogirlusa

customer_reviews.title: Totally useful!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to put the baby inside it! I regret not having bought the infant insert though because my baby is 3m. My son is very confortable in it, this is the perfect solution when you have to walk somewhere and you don't want to take the stroller. The only thing I have to watch for is if his pants are too tight in his tummy when he is in the front position (facing me).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had the beco with my first daughter but after 5 years in the er, needinf to chase a toddler around, and having had a 10 lb baby, I needed something with more back support. I opted for the mesh version bc it gets how here in Southern California. I'm happy with my purchase. The only downside (not the company's fault) is that my baby is so heavy and long that he's already outgrown the infant insert but isn't ready to be in the carrier without it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Description is Wrong.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but the description of this particular model is wrong. It is not for all stages of life because it requires you purchase an add on for new born infants. There is a model from same company that is for all stages of life that comes with the add on included. Would have been nice if they had mentioned it before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies 4 months and older.
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier with lots of nice features. Mesh back so baby doesn’t get too hot. Has a cool little hoodie for babies head. Easy to adjust buttons and great material. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because IT DOES NOT HAVE THE INFANT PAD INCLUDED. I must have not read the fine print before I bought it because my little one is only 10 weeks. Not recommended to use on baby under 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Godina

customer_reviews.title: It’s like magic, she just sleeps in it
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated on the cost of this with my first baby. I wouldn’t survive with a toddler and infant without this. I do laundry cook travel everything in it. WalkeFlew 4hrs alone with 3mth old and 3yr old with it. No trouble. It’s like magic, she just sleeps in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Raine

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Update to this review! I bought this 3 years ago for my second baby and now using it again for my third. Absolutely love my ergo! It all works perfectly and still looks great! With my second I used it ALL THE TIME!! So happy with this purchase!! It's easy to put on and easy to adjust. I have a ergo from 3 years ago that I still use and this one seems to be made even better!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: great for trying to get things done with a newborn/baby. Just make sure you ALWAYS watch your little one because my daughter liked to rest her head so her nose would sometimes be against me. I always was aware and corrected her right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My back is happy with it. My baby is happy to see everything sitting front face
customer_reviews.text: My baby and I absolutely love this carrier! Came new with good package. Perfect color for us. Great support, very comfortable for both of us. It is a little tricky to fix it on my back but it worth it! My back is happy with it. My baby loves sitting font face and see everything. We use the carrier not only for walking but at home as well. I can do my home work with my baby and we both are very glad. 100% recommend it for my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: Ergo Baby Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Really wish this one had more of the mesh to make it more breathable. I love my ergo 360 carrier that I have but desperately wanted the mesh version for the summer months. I believe the newer version of this product has more mesh and would work better for me, but with this being the second carrier I'd buy I really was looking for a cheaper option (purchased on prime day)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Spratt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and baby loves it. I only wish it was a little easier to put on by yourself. It’s difficult to do on my own without another adult to help with the back strap. Still love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Dani O

customer_reviews.title: It’s for big and tall
customer_reviews.text: If you are petite like me, 5 foot 2” tall you will not be able to use Ergobaby. It’s too big for small person to ware. It’s high quality product but if you can’t use it, it really doesn’t matter. I have tried it all, believe me, the only one that worked for me was Infantino 4 in 1. My baby is comfortable and I don’t feel the wait at all. Trust me it’s not about the price! Yes, Infantino Carrier is cheaper $29.69 @ Amazon. It just works.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan

customer_reviews.title: Velcro waistband sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This is an all around great carrier, but every time I have to take it off I want to burn it. The Velcro is a nightmare. If my baby falls asleep in it I have to put him down and then go downstairs in the garage to take the damn thing off without waking him up. Oh, and forget about adjusting it once it's on. I love the wide band for lower back support, but they really needed to rethink the Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it..
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this but I can’t put it on by myself. My arms aren’t long enough and trying to put it on with a wiggling baby is a challenge. I don’t even use it unless my husband helps me. Then it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Second one purchased
customer_reviews.text: Our second Ergobaby 360. Husband lost the first one. Worth the money due to comfort and how long you can use it for. The insert is necessary for infants but they grow quickly. The shoulder straps on this particular one we received are a bit awkward in that they flare up and don’t rest on your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby Investments
customer_reviews.text: I had a regular ergo and my baby would only tolerate it for about 15 minutes before he had enough. We would always end up with him being carried on my hip by the end of Our shopping trip. One day I just had enough and ordered this ergo 360. It was one of the best investments I have made. I can easily put him in this carrier and go to multiple stores. It's very very comfortable. It is also mesh and keeps us fairly cool. I regret not getting it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper#2

customer_reviews.title: ... of the carrier that my son sits on feels like it's digging into his leg
customer_reviews.text: The part of the carrier that my son sits on feels like it's digging into his leg. This is a bummer as he doesn't like sitting in it. I had the original 360 with my first son and thought this would be better because it's more breathable.
customer_reviews.author: D Thompson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Putting our 9 month old to sleep in this is a life saver! We put him facing us, and walk around. He's asleep in no time! When the wife is working in the garden, she puts him in it facing out, and he loves spending time outside with her. This thing works amazingly well!
customer_reviews.author: Teejeaux

customer_reviews.title: rides to high on babys face
customer_reviews.text: we have to tighten pretty tight to feel comfortable for us, but then seems to tight for baby who doesn't like the lack of room. it also rides to high in the front when facing out, baby's chin and mouth tend to get covered, or gets stuck under the chin. He also cant move his arms to well so he gets pretty fussy.
customer_reviews.author: markimus

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought for a friend of mine who was enjoying her first grandson, but having difficulty holding him due to physical limitations. She says that once she and a friend figured out how to wear it, she said it was a God send, enabling her to carry her grandson nearly effortlessly. I'm glad it has worked so well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Lachance

customer_reviews.title: To share love being together
customer_reviews.text: After using the carrier for more than a year, we still enjoy the approach that our carrier gives, the best purchase in raising my baby
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color, forward facing option works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Love the forward facing option not available in the Tula free to grow I have. Haven’t tried it in warm weather to test out the mesh but am going to take it to Disney in a few weeks and will update UPDATE: still love it and the breathable mesh is withstand the FL heat
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Carrier. More Versatile than our Boba 4G.
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier! Our baby girl loves to face out to see everything around her and I find it to be very comfortable to wear. We originally got the Boba 4G and loved it until our girl turned about 5 months old because she couldn't face outwards in the Boba 4G and was constantly twisting her neck to look in that direction.
customer_reviews.author: Husberi

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is easy to strap on and light weight. It does need an insert for infants. My son doesn't mind riding in it and often falls asleep while being toted around in it. It allows me to have my hands free and keep baby close, which makes both of us happy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, quality carrier. The straps can be a little challenging to adjust from behind, but not impossible. It was far superior to other carriers we tried. I never once worried about my child's safety in this. We got plenty of use out of it. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Overly complicated and feels insecure for baby
customer_reviews.text: Giving this two stars instead of one because the quality of the material is very nice, other than that I would look elsewhere for a baby carrier. It is overly complicated to use and adjust, as a tired new mom I want something simple and easy to figure out, this thing took way too long to adjust and switching to different modes of carry and adjusting between sizing for my husband and myself is just way too much work. On to of that no matter how we adjusted it our baby felt loose and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carrier! It’s very comfortable, easy to use, and most importantly, keeps babies hips how they should be. She loves to face out so this was the deciding factor. Both positions are easy to use and comfortable for her. It’s still hot in the summer time, but it’s another warm body against you... so not much you can do to keep cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Such a great carrier! So comfy and versatile. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Miljana Mitrovic

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Great Back Support
customer_reviews.text: Wear this pack with my 6 month old for hours at a time and never feel any back pain. Have even done short hikes with him in it. The roll up shade cover is nice too when it’s sunny out! Great support and my son loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable for me and baby. Still using infant insert but excited to try different carries. Well made carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Shayb669

customer_reviews.title: Great basic tool for daycare.
customer_reviews.text: Great basic tool for grandpas to Cary grandson everyware while doing things like vacuuming, working in the shop, lawn mowing, etc. My little buddy goes almost everywhere with me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. In Colorado

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is 12lbs (minimum weight requirement), but I ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 12lbs (minimum weight requirement), but I can't use it yet. The carrier is still WAY to big for her. I don't plan on buying the infant insert, so for now I'll continue to use the carrier I've been using until she get bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for your back
customer_reviews.text: Bought the BB about 5 years ago with the first kid and finally made the purchase for this one by the time the 3rd kid came out. Wow, what a difference on your back. It's a little annoying trying to slide the back support down (if you're putting this on by yourself) but this will save your back overall. Can't recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I thought I bought new one, but when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I bought new one, but when I got the product, it was used. When I opened the box, I immediately smelled very strong sour milk odor. So apparently, a baby threw up milk on the product before. I washed the product to get rid of the odor, but the smell still lingers on the manual...
customer_reviews.author: LEON

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 12 months
customer_reviews.text: Our Ergobaby lasted about 12 months before one of the lower support buttons snapped (see photo). Of course this happened slightly beyond the 12 month warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S.

customer_reviews.title: Bought the open box/like new and it’s perfect. This item is so pricey normally and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the open box/like new and it’s perfect. This item is so pricey normally and I really wanted one, so this was the only way I could justify getting one and I’m so glad I did. It’s in great condition and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect 4 kids. All with their own Ergos. This version is by far my fav.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I also have a Boba and Baby K'tan but this blows them out of the water! Very comfortable I wear it everyday for several hours. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was cheaper, but don't regret buying it. I really love this especially since I had a sling and another offbrand carrier. My daughter loves the outward facing position
customer_reviews.author: anngroteske

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and our baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: We love this, and so does our baby. The mesh version is great for our Florida climate and our baby took to being carried in it right away. She napped in it and ate two bottles. It’s easy to use, it’s sturdy, and I love that I can wear it and then we can adjust it and my husband can wear it. I’m really glad we can use it for a long time, too, since it carries in several positions and for up to 30+ pounds.
customer_reviews.author: kaycee m.

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent
customer_reviews.text: I mostly love everything about this EXCEPT the fact that the straps that go under the baby's arm and my arm are really rough with no padding causing chafing. For the amount of money I would expect complete comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids older than 3-4 months
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on using this carrier for your newborn do NOT forget to purchase the infant insert or your LO won't fit. It's an add-on for about $25 that is absolutely necessary until they are about 3 months old. It's more comfortable than my Bjorn which KILLS my back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable than the Bjorn but I do not like using ...
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable than the Bjorn but I do not like using it for the first 6-8 weeks because it doesn't feel like there is enough support (The Bjorn seems more comfortable at that point).
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier! It’s simple to use. I struggle to get the top snapped by myself if I keep it low, but if I move the back clip closer to my neck, I can get it alone. After clipped, I’m able to pull down on it so it’s not on my neck. I can unclip it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Only carrier my baby loved to be in! Tried so many others, this one is the best with the most support!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality carrier on the market
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most sturdy, High quality carrier on the market. Great product. I only wish it were cooler, tends To be too warm for hot days as it retains heat.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Its so comfortable. Being 5 momth pp, I have bad shoulder pain and lower back pain. With this carrier, I hiked almost a mile with my 15.5 lb baby in it. And no back/ shoulder ache..I was amazed. Looking forward to longer hikes..
customer_reviews.author: niki

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought a few other baby carriers and this by far has been the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Van Lange

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for us though easier once she didn't need the insert
customer_reviews.text: I like it now that my baby is older, but when she was littler I used it with the insert and found it a bit cumbersome. I've heard that the traditional ergo is a bit more comfortable. That said, now that she is bigger it works pretty well (we particularly like it for airport travel) and is easy to put on. I can't say whether the mesh is truly cooler or not as I haven't used the non-mesh versions.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E Parr

customer_reviews.title: A must have for babies!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for babies! My baby sleeps easily with this. Better than a stroller .
customer_reviews.author: duyduy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit and extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything and have watched countless videos but this carrier is so uncomfortable. The main issue is that the straps do not lay flat on my shoulders so it digs in and just becomes painful. Very disappointing and a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle McGetrick

customer_reviews.title: Its amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is amazing!!! I had a friend recommended this carrier and I'm so glad I went ahead and purchased 1.. our daughter is 9 months old and I can't get over how easy it is to get her in and out or change carry styles. She loves it and it is so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Liccardi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the baby and parents.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a kangaroo!!!! Great product easy to set up. My baby go confortable and me too. Multiple configurations. He loves when I use it in the backpack mode! There is no down side on this one. Great quality and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kane

customer_reviews.title: I wasn’t impressed
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult for a young baby. Even with the insert. It was very hot to have on outside. And very bulky. I just wasn’t very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Malorie

customer_reviews.title: Material not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Material is not soft, irritating baby skin, end up returning and buying Tula explore which is much softer~
customer_reviews.author: Zw

customer_reviews.title: I love this carrier its really nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier its really nice and comfortable. My 2 mo fits nicely in the incert. I have one complaint and that's the baby's head rubs against the shoulder strap and I have to add a burp cloth or blanket to help protect her head from getting rubbed. Other than that its really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier. We had the older version, but this one has more padding.
customer_reviews.author: Martha S.

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: After using the BjornBaby for our baby girl as an infant, we started looking for a more comfortable carrier as she got bigger. She's now almost 10 months and 20 lbs...and THIS IS definitely one of the best decisions we've made. We prefer the mesh because it breathes. It's also more convenient than the cotton one because it DOES NOT have the noisy Velcro that other complained about. Now...if we're talking about noisy velcro, it's probably not bad. But, the Ergobaby 360 MESH does not have the velcro. It's an easy buckle that snaps together. Definitely lets the baby sit a little lower on you and provides EXCELLENT support for hours. Stays cool, baby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: I love Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful between young baby and bad back. I hope it will help my back cope as the baby gets heavier. Definitely my favorite carrier so far (have tried 3 between 2 kids).
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: I had the original ergo which I was very pleased with but wanted to be able to face my ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the original ergo which I was very pleased with but wanted to be able to face my baby out. Beyond pleased with the 360! It's comfortable for me to wear and the cool mesh is crucial for my hot baby. I would recommend it over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: TMT

product_meta.title: Ergobaby Carrier, 360 All Carry Positions Baby Carrier with Cool Air Mesh, French Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:French BlueErgobaby's Award-Winning 360 Baby Carrier All Carry Positions with Cool Air Mesh offers every carry positions in a cool and breathable fabric to get out and about with baby, from summer hikes to leisurely strolls.

MAXIMUM COMFORT FOR BABY- With its unique, structured bucket seat, the versatile Ergobaby 360 carrier keeps baby ergonomically seated in all carrying positions (front-outward, front- inward, hip and back carry). Always ensures your baby is seated in an ergonomic "M"; shape position with knees even to or above hips, and spine in curved "C"; position. The versatile extendable back panel can be folded in providing head support for your young baby or unfolded extending the back panel giving your toddler the back support they need

MAXIMUM COMFORT FOR YOU- The wide padded waistband ensures maximum comfort by providing you with the support you need to maintain a healthy posture preventing lower back pain

COOL & BREATHABLE- Our Cool Air Mesh collection carriers are made with wonderfully soft and durable mesh fabric that provides our renowned ergonomic support for baby while allowing for ultimate breathability and airflow.
Highest safety standard - At Ergobaby, we take safety seriously. We hold all of our carriers to higher safety standards than those required by our industry


ADJUSTABLE- The 360 carrier is designed to fit all types of parents. It easily adjusts to fit multiple wearers from petite to larger body types (waistband adjusts 26-52"; shoulder straps adjust from 28 3/4" to 46 3/4"). This way, all parents can share the joy of babywearing. ALL CARRY POSITIONS INCLUDED: Face baby in or out. Wear on the hip or back as baby grows (4-48 months/12-45 pounds or start with newborn infant insert 0-4Months/7-12 pounds, sold separately)

STRONG, DURABLE, LONG LASTING CARRIER- Can be used for multiple years and multiple babies. No snagging & loosening. Carrier retains shape after wash for long-lasting use and comfort.

BABY-SAFE MATERIALS- Oeko-tex; standard 100% certified fabrics
feature_bullets: EXPLORE WITH BABY: For curious, developing baby who starts exploring beyond her caregiver to see the world (12-45 lbs./ 5.5-20 kg)
ALL CARRY POSITIONS: Inward, Front Outward, Hip & Back Carry
COOL AND BREATHABLE : Cooler for you and baby with soft, lightweight & durable mesh
COMFORT: Padded lumbar back support and shoulder straps.
ERGOPROMISE: If you find a manufacturing or material defect, Ergobaby will replace your carrier or part at no charge.

FILL HEARTS, NOT LANDFILLS: Everlove by Ergobaby is a first of its kind baby carrier buyback and restoration program. Ergobaby buys back your previously loved Ergobaby carriers and breathes new life into them for new families to enjoy.
PREMIUM FEATURES: UPF baby hood for sun protection and privacy for easy breastfeeding. Machine Washable.
